Difficult to prescribe SRP for bikes, says DTI chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741079 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741079/difficult-to-prescribe-srp-for-bikes-says-dti-chief/story/ As the demand for bicycles increases amid the lack of public transport under the general community quarantine, the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) admitted it is difficult to prescribe a suggested retail price (SRP) for all bikes. Suspension of VFA termination paves way for PHL-US military exercises, says expert tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741070 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741070/suspension-of-vfa-termination-paves-way-for-phl-us-military-exercises-says-expert/story/ “Ang pagsususpend ng abrogation ng VFA inaalis yong mga balakid na yon para mabigyan ng daan ang Estados Unidos na isagawa kung anumang military actions na gagawin niya sa region in order to balance the ongoing activities of China,” Banlaoi said. Sereno cautions against passing anti-terror bill until questions on freedoms answered tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741053 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741053/sereno-cautions-against-passing-anti-terror-bill-until-questions-on-freedoms-answered/story/ Former Supreme Court (SC) chief justice Maria Lourdes Sereno on Wednesday cautioned against the passage of the bill seeking to strengthen the country's anti-terrorism law until questions on its impact on Filipinos' freedoms are asked and answered."Matiisin ang Pilipino, but this should not be abused; and when Filipinos vent their frustration in the only way they can through social media, government should be careful not to repress the human spirit that must always find a way to express itself," Sereno said. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 19:18:23 +0800
